cards.title: Regeneron ISEF finalist
cards.text: International science and engineering fair, held in USA. Every year, roughly ten million students participate in science fairs around the world, but only about 1,500 of them make it to the finals.

cards.title: ONTI BD&ML
cards.text: Prize-winner of the ONTI 2021 Big Data and Machine Learning competition.

cards.title: Samsung’s contest “IT school chooses the strongest”
cards.text: Contest of Android projects for the graduates of the "Samsung IT school". First place among all categories.

cards.title: Samsung IT School
cards.text: Android development school. Graduated in 2019 with a golden diploma of excellence.

cards.title: Yandex.Lyceum
cards.text: Python and backend development school. Graduated the first year with honors (top 5-10% in country)

cards.title: Online courses
cards.text: "I took Harvard's "Introduction to computer science" course (CS50) and their "Introduction to AI" course (CS50AI)
